mapper.update: update workflow_event set graph_id = #{graphId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cur_node_id = #{curNodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_owner = #{eventOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cur_operator = #{curOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} where event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select event_id, graph_id, cur_node_id, event_owner, cur_operator, begin_date from workflow_event
